block.p: HERMANS-Avian. Beloved wife of Stuart Hermans, daughter of Ida Falk, sister to Marc, beloved niece of Sheila and Ben Kuznick, passed away on May 29, 2000. Funeral service on Wednesday 11:45AM at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 W. 76th St. In lieu of flowers, contributions in Avian's name to Dr. Theresa Gilewski, Vaccine Fund for Breast Cancer Research, Memorial Sloan-Kettering, 1275 York Ave., NY, NY 10017.
